sourcing.instructions: Antimony can be sourced from chemical suppliers like Sigma-Aldrich or through online marketplaces such as eBay or Amazon.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or muffle oven to 900째C (1652째F).

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours) without opening the furnace.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours) without opening the furnace.

steps: 1. Allow the solidified alloy to cool completely before handling.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Allow the solidified alloy to cool completely before handling.
